name: Strength
description: Bodily Power and Endurance - important for Renegades and Rangers

name: Speed
description: Agility, balance, and reflexes - important for Commandos and Infantry

name: Smarts
description: Awareness, Mental Acuity, Intuition, and Analysis - important for Technicians

name: Social
description: Confidence, Poise, Charisma, and Leadership - important for Officers and Vanguards
